explanation: [0-0] The background of the video is an anime character wearing a hat, standing under a tree, and looking out at the city. In the center is a video frame with a side profile anime avatar on top. The ID is Sarotsi X, and below it is the English text "Vergo messed with the wrong man," followed by a face covering its mouth and laughing and a fire emoji. In the center of the video, a man in a white coat and blue shirt is standing in front of a metal object, clutching a heart in his hand. Below the video frame is "0 Views".
[0-2] The camera zooms in on the man's hand as it tightly squeezes the heart. The number below the video frame keeps increasing.
[0-2] The camera zooms in on the man's hand as it tightly squeezes the heart. The number below the video frame keeps increasing.

[2-4] Then the scene switches, a black-haired man in black clothes has a ferocious expression on his face. He presses both hands to his heart, bends down with his mouth wide open, then straightens up and falls backward.

[2-4] Then the scene switches, a black-haired man in black clothes has a ferocious expression on his face. He presses both hands to his heart, bends down with his mouth wide open, then straightens up and falls backward.

[4-10] Immediately afterward, the scene returns to the man in white, who is still clenching the heart tightly, with a serious expression and black shadows on his face. The man in white slowly turns his head, then lets his hands drop to his sides and looks to the left of the screen. Behind him is a biochemical factory emitting a green light.

The dismembered body parts of the man in white are neatly placed on a railing, in front of which stands the man in black. The man in black, wearing a hat and carrying a knife, slowly takes a step forward. Immediately afterward, the scene switches to the head of the man in white. The man in white says a few words, then a white light flashes, and his head is split in two. The number below the video frame stops at 441985 Views.
